name: book Adding
description:
As a developer
  I want to add books through the API
  To enable management of books and relationships in our application.

elements.name: Un lector comenta un libro después de leerlo

steps.name: Soy un lector con el rol "lector"
Existe un libro con ID 123
Leo el libro con ID 123
Comento el libro con ID 123 con el siguiente contenido:

doc_string.value: Este libro me encantó. Muy recomendado.

steps.name: El comentario se agrega exitosamente al libro con ID 123

name: Comentar un libro después de leerlo

elements.name: Un autor define los idiomas disponibles para un libro

steps.name: Soy un autor con el rol "autor"
Existe un libro con ID 123
Defino los idiomas disponibles para el libro con ID 123:
Los idiomas se definen exitosamente para el libro con ID 123

name: Definir idiomas disponibles para un libro

steps.name: The Endpoint "http://localhost:%d/api/v1/profiling/profiles" is available
A Post Request is sent with values "Johan", "Huanca", 1
A status 201 response is received and the profile should be created with the reader role
A profile resource is included in the response body, with values "Johan", "Huanca",1
The Endpoint "http://localhost:%d/api/v1/profiling/profiles" is available
A Post Request is sent with values "Luis", "Reyes", 2
A status 201 response is received and the profile should be created with the author role
A profile resource is included in the response body, with values "Luis", "Reyes", 2
The Endpoint "http://localhost:%d/api/v1/profiling/profiles" is available

elements.name: Attempting to create a new profile with an invalid role

steps.name: That there are only the roles "reader", "author"
A Post Request is sent with values "Jhon", "Smith", 3
You receive error 500

name: Sagas Adding
description:
As a Developer
  I want to add Sagas through API
  So that It can be available to applications.

elements.name: Add Saga Status with unique name

A Response is received with Status 201
An Saga Status Resource is included in Response Body, with values "En Emision"
The Endpoint "http://localhost:%d/api/v1/students" is available

A Response is received with Status 400
